name: Nightmares No More
description:
Nightmares No More

Welcome to the Nightmare Police Department! Our mission is to protect people's dreams from nightmares.

Enter a person's mind and get shoot, bash and punch your way through all the anxiety or stress that's disturbing their sleep.

Note: this project is more of a prototype that I built to test the top-down shooting and finishing mechanics, so any feedback, positive or constructive, is greatly appreciated!
